Feb 23, 2003

Putting chemical weapons into perspective

Here in the United States, an unsexy virus not much associated with evil or terrorism — influenza — claims between 10,000 and 20,000 lives per year; smallpox hasn’t taken a life since the 1970s. From the American Prospect online.

Feb 23, 2003

Kerala kicks tribals out of their home.

The authorities in the southern Indian state of Kerala say they have cleared a wildlife sanctuary which was illegally occupied by more than 1,000 tribal people. In the LINK.
